channel.title: Android tablet
channel.description:
With his months wages I'm looking to buy a cheap Android tablet.
I'm looking for it to be under $200, would prefer to buy from Dealextreme, and it to have a community based on developing a custom rom (Cyanogen?) for it, and to be rooted.
Should be fat too..
Please help me! :)

item.title: Android tablet
item.dc:creator: @Unlimited1 .Unlimited
item.description:
@Unlimited1 wrote:

I use the Pandigital Novel (7") Its not the most powerful thing out there seeing as it is supposed to be a eReader.

http://www.slatedroid.com/index.php?board=43.0 for a lot of info about it and different hacks etc.

Plus you can get it for ~$100 if you catch the right sale or have coupons.

Read full topic

item.title: Android tablet
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

My dad bought an Archos 70 but it’s like 300$ probably. He rooted it and I’ve liked it too.

Read full topic
